alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Roosevelt; Sheridan; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 09 at 8:54PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following counties, Daniels, Roosevelt, Sheridan and Valley. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams. Water over roadways. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. Some gravel roads have wash outs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 850 PM MDT, local law enforcement and public reported flooding in the advisory area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
